attributes.action: allow Catholic Adoption Agencies to follow their consciences when asked to place children for adoption by same sex couples.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Freedom of conscience is a basic human right which should be protected by all governments. Catholic citizens are committed to a just society where all are treated fairly. The new laws will now make Catholic beliefs on family life unacceptable in public life. This is a grave injustice and contrary to the claims of the government that they wish to promote equality and oppose discrimination.
